Translations.Text: their protection in their winter and summer journeyings
Therefore let them worship the Lord of this House
who fed them when there was famine and shielded them from fear
HAVE YOU considered him that denies the Last Judgement
It is he who turns away the orphan
and does not urge the feeding of the destitute
but are heedless of their prayer
who make a show of piety
So pray to your Lord and sacrifice to Him
He that hates you shall remain childless
